    R3D: Regression Discontinuity with Distributional Outcomes

    R3D-package.Rd

    The R3D package provides methods to estimate, infer, and visualize a new class of regression discontinuity designs where the outcome is a distribution rather than a single scalar. It includes:

    • r3d: main estimation function

    • r3d_bwselect: bandwidth selection

    • r3d_bootstrap: multiplier bootstrap for uniform inference

    • S3 methods: summary.r3d, plot.r3d, print.r3d

    References

    Van Dijcke, D. (2025). Regression Discontinuity Design with Distributional Outcomes. Working paper.
